ModMetaData.name: Bulk Load For Transporters
ModMetaData.author: Ilarion
ModMetaData.description:
Tired of watching your colonists take all day to load transport pods and shuttles? This smart QoL mod supercharges their loading efficiency.
Enables multi-colonist bulk hauling for Transport Pods, Shuttles, Map Portals, Vehicles, and allows for bulk unloading of Pack Animals. Drastically reduces the time and labor needed for large-scale logistics. Requires Pick Up And Haul (or a compatible fork).
NOTE FOR USERS OF PUAH FORKS: You may see a warning icon about a missing dependency in the mod list. This is expected and can be safely ignored as long as you have an active Pick Up And Haul fork.
